solution_line_template: Half of the number of Randy's mango trees is {mango_trees}/{half_divisor} = <<{mango_trees}/{half_divisor}={half_mango_trees}>>{half_mango_trees} trees.
Therefore, Randy has {mango_trees} + {coconut_trees} = <<{mango_trees}+{coconut_trees}={total_trees}>>{total_trees} treeson his farm.
